name: product
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ikea_api.
Tool description: This [unofficial] Ikea API is a great solution for developers looking for a comprehensive and up-to-date access to Ikea's products and search. An Ikea Scraper REST API solution.
API description: Fetch up-to-date information for a specific product from the IKEA API.

countrycode.description: Can be obtained through the  **Countries** endpoint,

productid.description: Can be obtained through the  **Search By Keyword or Category** endpoints,

languagecode.description: The language code for the response. Default is 'en'.

store.description: Can be obtained through the  **Stores** endpoint,
